name: Pale Luna (Remade)
description:
This game is what it seems...

Inspired from the creepy text adventure game 'Pale Luna', developed by an anonymous programmer. This remake is made for people who want to experience the text game on their own.

Controls

Use keyboard to give commands. If you give the wrong command the program will close, forcing you to start it again.

Social Media

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdAhAWQpZ62mAAWJSuUpfew?

Discord: https://discord.gg/wcDJ5CF

Credits

Game by PpTheBest

Tools used:

  • Notepad++
  • Photoshop (For Icon)
FAQ Is this an exact copy of the original game?

Sorry to say, but no. I made the levels using the information I found on internet, and it turns out this game can be finished in a  minute, if you know the commands. It is a really short game, but is worth a try.

Will there be a mobile version?

Maybe. If this game gets a large audience, then I think I can make a mobile version.

Notice

If you have something you'd like to tell me, feel free to mail me: pratyushpriyadarshiofficial@gmail.com
